TopicTitle: My first detailed car I dare to show.

Articles.Content:
hi all.

so yesterday i started messing around with building a high-detailed car after seeing some Vagani video's (link to his channel https://www.youtube.com/user/pinkcrafters). His cars and methods gave me alot of inspiration.

I Present to you the K-Augusta

Its is extremly stable because of the inclined wheels. Working braking lights!

[Note: the car has 238 parts]

here are some pics

Side View

Top View

Spoiler View

Rear View

Bottom View

Is there any interest in this vehicle and should i put a download link up?

Tips on making it look better are welcome

I Have some other projects of detailed cars aswell, expect more in the future!

Peace out ~ Bakmeel

Wow, first great looking car, and another wow for finding somebody who watches my videos. But time for some constructive criticism and then of course a big good job list;

-Firstly I think it is too long, just my opinion.

Right then constructive criticism over, excellent job on the car, are you using a form of suspension, I can see hints of a spring type suspension at the front, but it might just be aesthetics, Id love a download, and finally do you mind if i link this to my forum thread?

Also happy first post!!! And id love to see what else you can make.
Neato man, love the look of it (Though i think it might need 2 more wheels maybe?) ill have to try it out when im done messing around with this SSTO
Well done this looks really good

Wow, thanks all for the amazing feedback! i think it is to long aswell, but once i was finished, i got to lazy to fix it.

About the suspension. I have no idea if it actually changes things. I copied your suspension and worked from there. Sure you can post it on your thread.

Feel free to Edit/improve/copy it.

Dowload (K-Augusta): https://www.dropbox.com/s/lmnzwcqzysjja87/K-Augusta.craft?dl=0

Here is a preview of my next project. The cabin is as good as finished. I still want to make a trailer for it and i guess that will take quiet some time(tips on how to do it are welcome).

Edited October 13, 2014 by Bakmeel
I really like this design. Just like vagani said, mabye a bit too long Really good and very stable

quick update. i might have found a way to make a trailer work. it involves landing gear

EDIT: MAZ replica is being build ATM will be finished tomorrow

Edited October 13, 2014 by Bakmeel
